short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds additional filters to the yoox.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a free extension for the yoox.com webshop. It adds additional filters, allowing you to search in a more fine-grained fashion.

Features:
- Filter items by details
- Filter items by composition
- Filter items by measurements
- Filter items by size (Useful for very large or small sizes)
- Choose your filter setting - should the item match all filters or at least one specified filter
